scripts.build: npm i && npm run build-prisma && mkdir -p ../gs_service/project && rsync --delete -rv src config ../gs_service/project/ && cd ../gs_service && npm run build
scripts.build-prisma: if [ ! -f '.prismagenerator' ] && [ `ls src/datasources/*.prisma | wc -c` -ne 0 ]; then npm run prisma-push; touch .prismagenerator; fi
scripts.eg-push: for f in src/datasources/eg_config/*; do echo ${f}; node ../gs_service/elasticgraph/lib/mappingGenerator/reIndexer.js ${f} all; done
scripts.gen-testSuite: npm run gen-apiDocs && mkdir -p tests && openapi2postmanv2 -s docs/api-doc.yaml -o tests/testSuite.json -p -O folderStrategy=Tags,includeAuthInfoInExample=false
scripts.prisma-push: for i in src/datasources/*.prisma; do npx --yes prisma generate --schema $i && npx --yes prisma db push --schema $i; done;
